errors.title: Oopsie daisy!
errors.execution_error: There was a hiccup while executing this command!
errors.execution_missing_perms: I don't have the necessary permissions to execute this command!

errors.no_api_key: The provider has not configured the API for this command!
errors.request_failed: The request failed.. Try again later!

language.success: The language has been changed successfully!

errors.no_link: No invitation link has been set by the bot owner!

success.add: The role <@&{role}> will now be assigned to new members!
success.remove: The role <@&{role}> will no longer be assigned to new members!

errors.no_role: The role is not an autorole!
errors.already_added: The role has already been added!

messages.added: The role <@&{role}> has been added successfully!
messages.deleted: The reaction-role message has been deleted!
messages.removed: The reaction-role <@&{role}> has been removed successfully!

errors.message_not_found: This reaction-role message does not exist!
errors.no_reactionroles: No reaction roles are defined on this server!

success.channel: The welcome channel has been set to <#{channel}>!
success.message: The welcome message has successfully been set!

errors.no_channel_or_message: No channel or welcome message has been set!

help: 1. Define the welcome channel with </welcome set channel:{commandId}>
2. Define the welcome message with </welcome set message:{commandId}>
3. Enable the welcome message with </welcome enable:{commandId}>
You can use the following variables in the welcome message:
You can use the following special characters in the welcome message:

success.msg_created: The message has been created successfully!
success.msg_deleted: The message has been deleted successfully!
success.msg_edited: The message has been edited successfully!

errors.msg_not_bot: This message was not sent by the bot!

success.embed_created: The embed has been created successfully!
success.embed_deleted: The embed has been deleted successfully!
success.embed_edited: The embed has been edited successfully!
success.embed_removed: The embed has been removed successfully!

errors.embed_not_bot: This embed was not sent by the bot!
errors.embed_no_title_description: The embed must have a title and description!
errors.embed_no_changes: No changes have been made to the embed!
errors.embed_no_embed: This message does not contain an embed!
